directions: Spoon about 1 teaspoon lemon curd into the bottom of each phyllo shell; top with whipped topping. Sprinkle a light dusting of cinnamon over the top.
ingredients: 1 (1.9 ounce) container frozen miniature phyllo shells, thawed
1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste
title: Lemon Curd Tarts
